title: Grain

properties.value: Grain is obtained by selecting 'Pick Wheat' in wheat fields growing in many places in RuneScape. They are also dropped by goblins and imps. It is used for Cooking.

Item ID1947

Grain is obtained by selecting 'Pick Wheat' in wheat fields growing in many places in RuneScape. They are also dropped by goblins and imps. It is used for Cooking.

One quick way is to get grain next to the hops patch in Yanille and go east to the bank in Yanille. Another is to get to grain is to use the canoe transport system on the River Lum. One could take the canoe to the Champions' Guild wheat field, then fill their inventory, then return to Edgeville to bank the wheat using the canoe. The wheat fields are also used to access Puro-Puro.

10 grain is required for Eadgar's Ruse.

[[File:Grain detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Grain''' is obtained by selecting 'Pick Wheat' in wheat fields growing in many places in RuneScape. They are also dropped by [[goblin]]s and [[imp]]s. It is used for [[Cooking]].

One quick way is to get grain next to the hops patch in [[Yanille]] and go east to the bank in Yanille. Another is to get to grain is to use the [[canoe]] transport system on the [[River Lum]]. One could take the canoe to the [[Champions' Guild]] wheat field, then fill their inventory, then return to [[Edgeville]] to bank the wheat using the canoe. The wheat fields are also used to access [[Puro-Puro]].

10 grain is required for [[Eadgar's Ruse]].
